research.title: Web Components/Polymer
research.description: I love Polymer so much. Almost all my web-based projects are using Polymer. Paper elements, iron elements, platinum elements, neon elements...

research.title: Material Design
research.description: Material Design is awesome. It looks so nice on the screen. Clean, simple, beautiful. Everyone loves Material Design right? (especially Duarte)

research.title: Progressive Web App
research.description: Native or Web? PWA works offline, and most important it looks like native app. I am a web guy, I prefer PWA.

research.title: Front-End Web Development
research.description: Back-end is complex(?). Front-end is simple (but not that simple) but still powerful. Love front-end web dev so much

research.title: Android Development
research.description: Although I love Web so much, I still make (and learn) Android development sometimes. Not always.
